description.value:
Aura 2

Enemies within the aura take a -2 penalty to saving throws.
Any enemy that hits with a power that would blind the emissary of Caiphon is instead blinded (save ends).

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ psychic

Standard

Attack: Melee 1 (one creature)

+31 vs. Reflex

Hit: 4d6 + 12 damage, and the target takes 20 psychic damage the first time it fails a saving throw before the start of the emissary's next turn.

At-Will ✦ charm, psychic

Standard

Attack: Ranged 10 (one creature)

+31 vs. Will

Hit: 3d6 + 8 psychic damage, and the emissary slides the target 2 squares. The target then makes a melee basic attack as a free action against a target of the emissary's choice.

At-Will ✦ charm, psychic

Standard

Attack: Ranged 10 (one creature)

+31 vs. Will

Hit: 3d8 + 18 psychic damage, and the emissary chooses one of its allies. The target is marked by this ally. Until the end of the emissary's next turn, the emissary and all its allies except the chosen ally are invisible to the target.

At-Will ✦ illusion

Minor

Effect: The emissary can disguise itself to appear as any Medium or Small humanoid. A creature that succeeds on a DC 40 Insight check can see through the illusion.

Recharge when first bloodied

Minor

Attack: Ranged 5 (one creature)

+33 vs. Will

Hit: The target fails any saving throws it makes until the end of the emissary's next turn.

Recharge when the emissary takes psychic damage ✦ psychic

Triggered

Trigger: The emissary hits with blinded by greed or blinded by need.

Effect (Free Action): The attack deals 3d10 extra psychic damage.

system.rechargeCondition: when the emissary takes psychic damage

description.value:
Triggered

Trigger: The emissary drops to 0 hit points.

Effect (Immediate Interrupt): One enemy within 10 squares of the emissary that is subject to an effect that a save can end takes a -5 penalty to all saving throws against that effect until the end of the encounter.
